glyph.content: glyph → int (Read Only): The index of the glyph that represents this text line.

fontIndex.content: fontIndex → int (Read Only): The index of the font that the glyph belongs to. Glyphs are not interchangable between fonts.

text.content: text → str (Read Only): The text for this line.

origin.content: origin → tdu.Position (Read Only): A tdu.Position object that gives the baseline origin of the line of text.

lineWidth.content: lineWidth → float (Read Only): The width of the format box of this line of text. This member is not used by the Geo Text COMP.
